trends: There have been 7 other sightings in The Dalles
There were no other sightings in The Dalles on or around February 22nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSetting on porch having a cup of coffee,seen lights coming from East thought it was an airplane took a picture and this what I got. The lights where blinking in an off an on cycle.The drawing is a airflight pattern that I have studied for a year. The ones you see at Mt. Hood came from the S.W. The one on the side of Mt. Hood stayed about 30 min. then started going down in front of Mt. Hood and stayed for awhile then took off to the South. The others came from the S.W. and stayed in front of Mt. Hood, Secound one took off to the south and the third one went up the S.E. Ridge. The fourth one came from the north to the West. There is another Flight pattern up Skyline Road Between the S.E. & South Going towards the West. The Red is where something Exploded. DMM
Summary: Was on back porch,seen lights coming from the East toward the North West,thought it might be an airplane so I took the picture .
